CLUE: Seat of the high kings of Ireland
FOUND IN: According to legend, Tara was the site of the coronation of the High Kings of Ireland and the location of their royal court
The name "Persia" refers to the ancient Persian Empire, which was located in the Middle East and covered much of modern-day Iran, Iraq, and parts of Turkey, Armenia, and Azerbaijan.

Mount Ararat - Located in present-day Turkey, this mountain is the highest peak in the region and has been identified as a potential location for Noah's Ark due to its proximity to the ancient civilization of Mesopotamia.
